verses.verse: But <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,

As for <S%H7879>me<s%>, is my complaint to <S%H120>man<s%>? and if it were <S%H7307>so<s%>, why should not my spirit be <S%H7114>troubled<s%>?
<S%H6437>Mark<s%> <S%H8074>me<s%>, and be astonished, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Even when I <S%H2142>remember<s%> I am <S%H926>afraid<s%>, and <S%H6427>trembling<s%> takes hold <S%H270>on<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
Therefore do the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, become <S%H6275>old<s%>, <S%H1396>Yes<s%>, are mighty in <S%H2428>power<s%>?
Their <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> in their <S%H6440>sight<s%> with <S%H6631>them<s%>, and their offspring before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H7965>safe<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%>, neither is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of God upon <S%H433>them<s%>.

They send <S%H7971>forth<s%> their little <S%H5759>ones<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and their <S%H3206>sons<s%> <S%H7540>dance<s%>.

They <S%H3615>spend<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>wealth<s%>, and in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> go <S%H2865>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%>.
Therefore they <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H2654>us<s%>; for we desire not the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of your <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
What is the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3276>him<s%>? and what profit should we <S%H6293>have<s%>, if we pray unto him?
<S%H2898>Behold<s%>, their good is not in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>: the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is far from <S%H7368>me<s%>.

<S%H433>God<s%> lays <S%H6845>up<s%> his <S%H205>iniquity<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: he <S%H7999>rewards<s%> <S%H3045>him<s%>, and he shall know it.

For what <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> has he in his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4557>him<s%>, when the number of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is cut off in the <S%H2686>middle<s%>?
Shall any <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>? seeing he <S%H8199>judges<s%> those that are <S%H7311>high<s%>.
One <S%H4191>dies<s%> in his <S%H8537>full<s%> <S%H6106>strength<s%>, being wholly at <S%H7946>ease<s%> and <S%H7961>quiet<s%>.
His <S%H5845>breasts<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%>, and his <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H8248>moistened<s%> with <S%H4221>marrow<s%>.
And another <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and never <S%H398>eat<s%> with <S%H2896>pleasure<s%>.
They shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and the <S%H7415>worms<s%> shall cover <S%H3680>them<s%>.
<S%H3045>Behold<s%>, I know your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>, and the <S%H4209>devices<s%> which you wrongfully imagine against <S%H2554>me<s%>.
For you <S%H559>say<s%>, Where is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince<s%>? and where are the <S%H4908>living<s%> <S%H168>places<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>?
Have you not <S%H7592>asked<s%> them that <S%H5674>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>? and do you not <S%H5234>know<s%> their <S%H226>tokens<s%>,
That the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> is <S%H2820>reserved<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H343>destruction<s%>? they shall be brought <S%H2986>forth<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath<s%>.

The <S%H7263>clods<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> unto <S%H120>him<s%>, and every man shall <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4557>him<s%>, as there are innumerable before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
